Vulois

Vulois responded to Windrazor and Terradive.

"Our chances of staying alive are great. It's getting out that's the 
problem. We could wander this mountain for years. But incase we don't 
get out, there's something I need to do."

Vulois stopped and opened up his comm.

"Battera.....It's Vulois. I've tried moving the embassy to this 
mountain, but I think we've taken a wrong turn and are lost. We may 
never get out. If we make it, we'll call again, but for now there's 
something I need to tell you. You've always been the one for peace, 
even when I was scheming. In away this os your mission. Whoever heard 
of Preds wanting peace, eh?(chuckles hopelessly). So, since you have 
been with me so long, if I don't make it, I want you to lead the 
group. To host the conference back at the embassy. Don't do anything 
now, we might still make it. But if you don't here from us again in 
two days, assume command. We're going to far out of range now, so you 
won't be able to contact us. Good-bye Battera. You've been a good 
friend."

Vulois continues down the tunnel.
______________________________________________________________________
Starscream/Gotron

Starscream and Gotron continue to fight inside the cave, when the 
message from KitKat comes through. Realization dawns on the two bots.

"You're Alliance?"

"You're Predacon?"

"Yes! We're allies. Quickly, we must get out before it explodes!"

Starscream and Gotron heads to the door, but from all their fire 
power, the part infront of the door collapses, leaving them trapped 
in. Starscream contacts Phobia's ship.

"Hello? Anyone? This is the Predacon Starscream(at this point Gotron 
stares in wonder and mutters "Starscream?" and another Alliance bot. 
What's your name?("Gotron.")Gotron's his name. Please, we are trapped 
inside the Pred cave. We need assistane now. The door is caved-in. 
Please, just shoot it open with the ships lasers or something. We beg 
for help!"
______________________________________________________________________
Savage

Savage dodges a few of the shots, but some hit him in the tail. 
Savage is enraged, and swings his massive spikey tail right at Spears 
and Striker.
